price: (34) And We did not grant to any man before you eternity [on earth]; so if you die - would they be eternal?
arabic: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا لِبَشَرٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ ٱلۡخُلۡدَۖ أَفَإِيْن مِّتَّ فَهُمُ ٱلۡخَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamā jaʿalnā libasharin min qablika al-khul'da afa-in mitta fahumu al-khālidūna
